item.title: Multiple loggins from one ip?
item.dc:creator: @_npc1 ::npc1
item.description:
@_npc1 wrote:

Alright so I’m sorta new to coding, but I’ve been having trouble with this for a while. My brother wants to be able to play the server the same time I’m on, but apparantly my source doesn’t allow multiple accounts from the same ip. In client java i found this:

			// uncomment this code below to stop multiple logins from 1
			// computer.

			/*
			  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
			  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
			  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
			  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
			  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
			  true; return; } }
			 */

but when I just delete that I get errors in the compiler. If somebody knows how to solve this that’d be great.

Read full topic
